name: cm-zapier
description: CM is a mobile messaging, voice, authentication and payment platform that enables you to engage with your target audience by mobile communication.
author: CM.com

scripts.test: echo ────────── lib: utils ───────── && mocha --recursive build/lib/utils/tests && echo ─────────── lib: CM ─────────── && mocha --recursive build/lib/CM/tests && echo ───────── lib: Zapier ───────── && mocha --recursive build/lib/Zapier/tests && echo ───────────── src ───────────── && mocha --recursive build/src/tests
